name: Icy Planes VR
description:
In this game you operate a little bowl-shaped vehicle called "Chawan". On the dashboard there is a display which shows you important messages so be sure to look at it from time to time. Chawan doesn't have any special functions. You can only move, jump and bump into things with it.

You will encounter two types of balls. First type is a single-coloured ball which can activate goal poles. All you need to do is get each ball touch the matching light of the pole base. This will activate the goal pole. Once all poles are activated, the second type of ball will fall from the sky. It is called the "doll". As if playing football, you need to get this ball between the poles to score.

When the doll enters the game, timer will start. As you get better you can beat your previous scores and get a medal.

After finishing each level, you unlock the next level.

Have fun!

Virtual Reality

This game was designed with virtual reality in mind. Supported technologies are:

  • Google VR (Cardboard)
  • Steam VR
  • Open VR
  • Oculus
